description: Create a Pulumi TypeScript program to optimize an existing Lambda-based order processing system that currently suffers from performance bottlenecks and cost overruns. The configuration must: 1) Refactor Lambda function configuration with 512MB memory and 30s timeout, 2) Implement Lambda reserved concurrency of 50, 3) Enable X-Ray tracing, 4) Configure CloudWatch Log retention to 7 days, 5) Add proper tagging with Environment, Team, and CostCenter tags, 6) Implement Lambda function versioning and alias, 7) Set up CloudWatch alarms for 1% error rate over 5 minutes, 8) Configure DLQ using SQS, 9) Optimize deployment package, 10) Add CloudWatch dashboard for key metrics.
